author: Quint Forgey
title: Coronavirus will be 'imprinted on the personality of our nation for a very long time,' Fauci warns
description: The stark comments represented a new kind of diagnosis from the country's top infectious disease expert.
content: More than 4,000 Americans have already perished as a result of the illness and the total number of Covid-19 infections is surging toward 200,000, although experts agree the actual number of those sickened is likely much greater because of limited testing capa… [+1131 chars]
